The Tower of Sealed Spirits Research Crew is considering giving you a reward. <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Hey
column2: not now! Open up your bag later!</FONT>  Just bear in mind that if you keep up the good work
column3: then you will be assured of gaining some awards. I'm counting on you to keep performing well in the future. <PF>So
column4: tell me: did you accomplish our mission with ease?

column2: come back when you're done.

column1: I'm the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Meowgel</FONT> that has been sent from Headquarters of the Tower of Sealed Spirits  Research Crew. My job is to record your actions and evaluate your accomplishments. <PF>So
column2: tell me: did you accomplish our mission with ease?
come back when you're done.
your bag is full. My body is only capable of sending the item
column3: it can't organize your bag for you!  I can't give you the item under this condition! <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>So
column4: I want you to organize your bag</FONT>!  Meow!

column1: The <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Sickel Weasel</FONT> that became a monster after many long years of development
column2: has a monstrous sickle and a sharp claw. They can move as fast as lightning and slice humans almost invisibly. The wounds are capable of killing instantaneously and people fear them so much that they can not even walk outside anymore. You're the hero who I've chosen to defeat this beast
column3: thereby protecting the people of this village!

column1: A monster that gains knowledge from books non-stop
column2: the so-called <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Demon Paper Man</FONT> has been engaged in some suspicious activities recently. They apparently want to control the monster world by launching an attack on humanity. You see
column3: were such an attack to be successful
column4: then their ranking in the monster world would shoot up. For this reason
column5: they appear desperate to win this battle. You're our only hope of winning the fight against them. Do you have the courage to face them?

column1: A spirit that became trapped inside the mirror and could not escape. Failing that
column2: it combined with the mirror to form a monster called the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Magical Mirror</FONT>. It plays with human beings and enjoys watching them suffer. But in reality
column3: it wants the people to somehow break the spell that would release them from the mirror. For
column4: if the mirror is ever physically broken
column5: the spirit inside will die. This may explain why the mirror always tries to strike first. On the other hand
column6: it is rather counter-productive since they require the help of humans! In any case
column7: either be prepared to attack when confronted by the mirror
column8: or help release the spirit from its curse.

column2: the stone statue in the accessory shop becomes animated. Although it may only appear to be a statue
column3: in actuality the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Stone Gargoyle</FONT> is a living monster. It hunts in a pack and takes its prey back to the nest
column4: where it feeds on them. It is extremely violent outside the nest. In order to attack it
column5: you must venture deep inside its nest. Can you defeat it andsave the village people?

column1: A dream of the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Pink Mummy</FONT> is to establish a comfortable household and produce a couple of children with a man she loves. However
column2: these mummies value appearance more than anyone else
column3: making it almost impossible for them to find a suitable partner. Moreover
column4: because they want to produce a pure-blooded child
column5: their frustration keeps growing. When that frustration reaches its peak
column6: this mummy starts attacking humans as a way of alleviating stress. Any male unfortunate enough to be attacked by the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Pink Mummy</FONT> turns into a mummy himself and will also be expected to help make children. This set of events has sent the people of the village into a state of panic. Do you think you will be able to help the villagers by defeating these mummies?

column1: During the ages when a plague was in the air
column2: many children lost their lives. The poor families were not able to bury their dead
column3: so they left the bodies in the Ancient Castle. These babies were transformed into monsters called <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Dracrow</FONT> by the vampire that was hiding in this castle. Because they are kids
column4: Dracrows do not attack human beings; rather they suckthe blood out of local domesticated animals. Although this does not affect the lives of people directly
column5: it will damage their well-being in the long run. Do you have the courage to confront these poor sinning children and scold them into changing their ways?

column2: the wolves have evolved. A new species that has been born is called the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Werewolf</FONT>. They are able to transform into a Werewolf without the presence of the full moon
column3: and they will kill anything in sight every night. Such relentless
column4: merciless behavior has sent people into a great state of shock. The howls of the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Werewolf</FONT> resonates throughout the night and local villagers are afraid to leave their houses. Do you have the courage to face these beasts and restore peace among the village people?

column1: The <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Forest Sickel Weasel</FONT> that has a strong protective coloration that makes them almost invisible in the forest where it lives. column2: the vicious ones attack people while they are stealing and in extreme cases they kill them as well. Do you have the courage to stop these little
column3: but often dangerous
column4: thieves?

column1: The <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Copper Gargoyle</FONT> developed a strong immunity against magic after absorbing a great deal of spiritual power throughout the ages. Aside from this immunity
column2: their wings and sharp claws make them a very formidable monster that can kill people easily. In fact
column3: many pedestrians - mainly women and children - have been killed because of them. This has filled people's lives with fear. Do you have the courage to step forth and save them from this situation?

column1: A monster that was born by absorbing a multitude of spiritual powers is called the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Synthesized Beast Chimera</FONT>. They were created by Lucifer himself to destroy humanity. Their beasts' roar shakes the earth and splits the heavens. They are hiding in the dungeon and are at this very moment seeking a way out in order to destroy the world. Do you have the courage to stand in front of their hell-blazing fire and strike this beast down?

column2: Blood-Thirsty Doll

column1: An evil spirit that has been placed inside a doll
column2: repeatedly takes innocent lives on Lucifer's orders. This is why the monster <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Chuckey</FONT> appears to be alive. It is a fearful creature for a couple of reasons. First of all
column3: it has the ability to duplicate itself automatically when it is killed
column4: so it turns out to be awfully hard to destroy. Secondly
column5: while its frightening appearance may seem obvious to adults
column6: innocent young children are not able to distinguish it from a normal doll! Are you capable of stopping its madness from continuing?

column1: The <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Executioner</FONT> is a monster that has a very important role in the magical world. His entry into the human world has been made in an effort to weaken the seal that separates the human and magical worlds. He can be recognized by his shaven head and mask
column2: but the most frightful of his features is the tattoo inscribed on his arm. They are extremely hard toeliminate. Can you succeed at that task?

column1: After a Fly Man goes through thorough training
column2: it evolves into a monster called the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Fly Warrior</FONT>. This transformed creature possesses quickness as well as power
column3: and because it is powerful
column4: it often fights on the front lines of battles. In fact
column5: they are battle junkies and their passion is eating human children. Do you have the ability to stop these merciless creatures and restore peace?

column2: they are creating sapphires from human souls. What happens to the bodies that are left behind? The people whose souls have been sucked out have taken to attacking people. The only way to resuscitate these people is todefeat these monsters.

column1: A clump of magma gained life after absorbing the spiritual powers that existed inside lava. Now they are a dangerous force to contend with. These so-called <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Magma Gargoyles</FONT> are extraordinarily good at using flame spells and they can change their body temperature as they wish. This makes them capable of melting down almost anything they want to which inturn
column2: makes it difficult to bring them down with weapons. So many Warriors have tried to defeat this monster
column3: to no avail. Being a courageous hero
column4: you can save so many people by defeating the monster!

column2: Gold x 1060

column2: the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Martial Arts Sickel Weasel</FONT> is the king of the Sickel Weasels. They are adept at every type of martial arts and can strike down an adult male in only a few blows. Many courageous people have stood up against this monster and tried to defeat it
column3: but they have all proven unsuccessful. Now that nobody is willing to oppose them
column4: they have become bored out of their minds. To kill time
column5: they have emerged from their lair and begun attacking the people in the village. Oh
column6: these unfortunate
column7: powerless people! All they can think about is who will come forward and stand up for the weak. Can you help them out? Can you solve their problem by defeating the king?

column2: a weird series of poisoning incidents has occurred in the village. Many people have become inexplicably poisoned
column3: but no one knows for sure who is responsible. One of the possible answers though is that a <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Fairier</FONT> is the culprit. It is true that <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Fairiers</FONT> are not usually strong like this
column4: but the villagers may be inhaling this poison unintentionally. Once poisoned
column5: people start to hallucinate and grow weaker and weaker by the moment. The townspeople are at their wits' end and do not seem to have the patience to deal with this poisoning. So you think you can solve this problem for them?

column1: A school Principal created a mechanical monster that is called <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Little Franken</FONT>'. It raged out of control after bathing in the mana. Now that it has lost control, it attacks everything in sight and is extremely dangerous. Humans are in particular peril. Its strong weapons are capable of killing people in seconds and they are currently plotting to escape from theirsealed-off world. We have been thinking about some way to solve this problem, but cannot come up with an acceptable solution. Oh hero, can you do something to help?			Quest	Quest.XML	31078.Description

column1: The Mage tribal masters entered the Lost Cave with the intention of defeating the Grand Master Jiang Shi. But because they accidentally touched the poisonous corpse they themselves
column2: became transformed into <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Grand Master Jiang Shi</FONT>. Now that they are neither human nor spirit
column3: they are wandering around aimlessly
column4: without a plan or anything to do. This situation has frustrated them and so they have decided to take their grudge out on the people that are living life peacefully. They are using the same tactics on the people as were used against the Grand Master Jiang Shi who was defeated by them. I want to ask you to defeat these monsters so as to save the innocent people. Doing so will also help all the GrandMaster Jiang Shis rest in peace too.

column2: Gold x 436

column1: Cutting and creating paper dolls and patterns is one of the most popular activities engaged in by girls. However
column2: they used paper as if it existed in endless supply
column3: without thinking of the consequences. Little did they realize that those trees that were chopped down transferred their grudges into the paper! Due to the information written on the paper
column4: it suddenly gained spiritual powers
column5: becoming a monster called the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Spell Book Overseer</FONT>. Now that they have the ability to freely move about
column6: these books can jump out of the rack and strangle people as they are sleeping. Without realizing it
column7: many of the paper patterns created by little girls ended up taking away their lives. And now it turns out that another problem with the spell bookmonsters has arisen: after the Spell Book Overseer was captured inside a grand spell book
column8: people have been saying the Overseers are planning to kill all the people who helped trap them in the spell book. This is something that must be prevented
column9: at all costs. You need to do something to stop them!

column2: Gold x 1410

column1: A monster whose rotting body gives him a disgusting appearance
column2: the '<FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Fearful Wonder Man</FONT> is a creature with a heart as ugly as its exterior. Its strong desire for vengeance makes it able to attack people without mercy and in extreme cases he shaves the skin off his victim's faces to make them suffer all the more. Do you find this kind of behavior acceptable? I don't think so. Please defeat them.
Gold x 233

column1: <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Little Mr. Water Drop</FONT> is a monster that was originally harmless. However
column2: After sucking up evil spirits that were floating around in the dungeon
column3: it started to form an evil personality. Now
column4: it is no longer shy
column5: as it once was. It is very aggressive and attacks people by poisoning their drinking water. You're our only hope! please defeat them!

column2: it affected the fairies greatly. The fairies now can no longer live anywhere else but in the mountains. Unfortunately
column3: this was an environment that they were not used to living in. Although they call themselves the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Fairies of Eden</FONT>
column4: do not be fooled by the name: they have started to attack people
column5: due to the invasion of their living space.At first they attacked people who entered the mountains
column6: and in the process they slowly gained back their territory. And now they have taken residence in a dungeon
column7: plotting the extermination of human beings. Based on the discovery of documents detailing their operation in the mountains
column8: their exact location has been revealed. It is imperative that wedefeat them before they put their plan in action!

column1: The army of Dullahans had already started to attack the human world. Many brave people ventured forth to try to defeat them but were unsuccessful. According to the few that returned from battle
column2: these Dullahans are equipped with armor that is tinted red and smells like blood. Some suggest that maybe that armor was colored by the spilling of so much human blood.This mission seems as if it will be a hard one
column3: but there appears to be no one else but you who can do the job. We beg you

column2: who fell into love with each other deeply?  Attention: The only person who has talked to the sorrowful <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Uncle Granikov</FONT> and helped <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Lime investigate the Crystal Crevice</FONT> can have dialogues with Isala and complete the quest!

column1: Destroy the Evolved Wolf of Arilan
Kill Quest Target: Evolved Wolf of Arilan %d / %d

column2: stop! You killed Arilan. You dared to kill Arilan. I am sure the Fang Wolf you killed just now is Arilan!   I know I have no reason to complain to you
column3: because Arilan has lost humanity and become a Fang Wolf. Everything is caused by my father
column4: the leader of science and civilization
column5: Granikov!  He sold his soul to a demon in order to prevent my eloping with Arilan and signed an agreement with the evil King of Evil Magic. The King of Evil Magic summons the wolf troop to attack the lone residents or travellers. A lot of innocent people are wounded and forced to be separated from their family members. Recently
column6: a lot of missing girls from the town have been taken to meet the Fang Wolf because they cannot endure what they must put up with after going missing and becoming the lovers of the Fang Wolf.  Fang Wolf has the terrible ability to demonize the person he wounds and turn them into werewolves. Arilan was scratched by a Fang Wolf at the night we eloped. His body began to change shortly afterwards. But he didn't tell me and hid here alone. I loved him deeply
column7: how could<PF>it be that I couldn't find out what happened to him. I have sworn I will stay with him no matter what he becomes.   My father is so silly to do such things. He not only failed to break us up
column8: but also ended up hurting more people. Arilan is dead now and I have lost the desire to go on living. You killed Arilan
column9: but I don't fault you for that. I only hope that you can promise me one thing. Please help me to kill <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>King of Evil Magic</FONT> and bring his <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>head</FONT> to sacrifice to Arilan. Will you do this?

column1: I don't want your apology. I only want the head of the Wicked Wicked King. It hurt us so deeply that a lot of people are hurt by Fang Wolf. A lot of couples
column2: lovers
column3: mothers and sons have to leave each other due to this. Everything bad is caused by it. I can spare it!

column1: Thank you very much. It will collapse here. There is a piece of rope ahead and you can crawl out the cranny along it.  You must remember what I have asked of you after you go out and take <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>the head of Head of Wicked King</FONT> and come to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>the Crystal Crevice</FONT> to sacrifice it.
You are young and have a promising future. No need to stay here. The Crystal Cave will be buried by gravel. Go now! You should take vengeance for us! Go!
Who are you! Why are you here?   I get it. You must be a bad guy trying to catch Arilan here. Just go away! Come back after you've cleared things up. Don't trouble innocent people.
Enter the habitation of Van Helsing to assault him with the Calm Evil item

column1: Talk to Van Helsing holding the Silver Cross

column2: glad to meet you
column3: and sit down for a drink and let me introduce here to you. The Sacred Hilltop is the highest place in Karma Blazing Land and is the place full of holy spirits and purity.  It was said that this was the place where the mysterious old man taught four young heroes. It is also the turning point for human life. So it is civilized here and everyone is full of respect for it. The landscape and terrain are very precipitous and magnificent. I feel quietness and harmony staying here. You should have the same feeling!   Don't you drink? This is the wine brewed by my good friend Batabi. It is mellow. Just try it!

column1: Wow! (the Silver Cross stabs in to the chest of Van Helsing)   Why... Why do you do this? You know who I am? I am sure. You know to use <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Silver Cross</FONT> to deal with me. You must know who I am or know I am a demon.  I have left the human world and lived here for many years. Why don't you spare me? Is it me that chose such a fate? You are not cruel enough to kill me in one stroke! Come on. Stab the cross into my heart. Come on!
You don't look good. Are you under the weather?

The Sacred Hilltop is the highest place in Karma Blazing Land and is the place full of holy spirits and purity. It was said that this was the place where the mysterious old man taught four young heroes. It is also the turning point for human life.  So it is civilized here and everyone is full of respect for it. The landscape and terrain are very precipitous and magnificent. I feel quietness and harmony staying here. Friend
column2: I am really sorry. You don't often come here. But I have no time to show you around the Sacred Hilltop because I have some important things to do. After I tackle the emergent business
column3: I come back to drink happily and appreciate the beautiful scenery.

He has inscrutable magic power and is good at black magic. But there is one day per month when his magic power becomes very weak. This is the time when he needs to swallow the priests.  Such a time happens to be today. I plan to go to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Amethyst Cave (south)</FONT> and kill <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Death</FONT> after drinking with you and saving <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Batabi</FONT>.

column1: In the Mysterious Kingdom of Namu
column2: a spirit slumbered for centuries. But this slumbering soul was unintentionally awakened for some unknown reason. This <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Crimson Mummy</FONT> is a cursed mummy
column3: created due to the mistake of a shaman. Being the source of all evil
column4: this mummy was sealed away from the rest of society through the great effort of many priests. But now that it has come back to life
column5: someone must defeat it. It's you who can defeat this grand evil. Once you do
column6: you must seal this cursed Namu Kingdom so that it can never be accessed again!

Oh! My God!  You should arrange your back pack. It is like a warehouse that has not been arranged for a long time in there. I know that brave heroes do not deal with formalities. But
column2: you know that I am very small in stature
column3: so sending you out has consumed a lot of my strength. What's more
column4: your backpack is so heavy. I cannot bear it
column5: really! I cannot carry it any more. <font COLOR=#00ff00>Please arrange your back pack
column6: OK</FONT> ?

It seems that a mysterious treasure chest is buried in an underground castle that is filled with mysterious power. It is said that the owner of the treasure chest will give <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>the key to the holy hero that is able to help him purify the Underworld Castle</FONT>. Are you the holy hero that has the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Key of Purification</FONT> ?   Purify the Underworld Castle! The mysterious treasure chest awaits inside!
<font COLOR=#00ff00>(Insert:Key of Purification)</FONT>   <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>(Attention! the key will disappear after it is inserted!!)</FONT>
<font COLOR=#00ff00>(Obtain Devils Bloody Stone x2)</FONT>    <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>(Will you leave?)</FONT>
<font COLOR=#00ff00>(Obtain Wicked Eye Agatex2)</FONT>    <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>(Will you leave?)</FONT>
<font COLOR=#00ff00>(Obtain Wicked Stone x2)</FONT>    <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>(Will you leave?)</FONT>
<font COLOR=#00ff00>(Nothing is inside due to theft of Demonic Ghost.)</font>

column1: What's the matter? You are not the Captain?

<FONT COLOR=#00ff00>X'mas</FONT> is an important day in the world for mortals to celebrate the birth of God. The Demonic Ghosts injected the evil souls into the holy <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>X'mas Snowmen</FONT> on Christmas Eve... These cursed X'mas Snowmen are in the Ice Cave. They call that chilly place the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Ice and Snow World</FONT>  Defeat them! Heroes... I'm sure you can do it!
See? The Christmas Snowmen in the magical spirit wall! They are the cursed Snowmen... In order to protect you from the harsh cold here
column2: I will be right here standing beside you!! <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Five minutes after your first step into this icy world... you will be transferred back to the normal world without warning</FONT>
column3: regardless of whether you killed them all or not. This is the only way we can provide protection
column4: though we are positive of your power and courage... bless you!<FONT COLOR=#00ff00> Only one person can through the wall at a time! Please line up ... </FONT>

column2: please!
that's all right... ! I will send you through after everything is ready!
that's all right... ! I will send you through after everything is ready!

column1: Going back will cause you to fail this task! Are you sure about going back?

column2: I know that!
I will stay...

column1: ... Hey... Hey... Hey... (so cold) Remember what I told you before? This task is for the Christmas Adventurer with the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>candy box</FONT> only! I don't see any <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>candy box</FONT> symbolizing the happiness of God's birth! Did you forget to bring it with you? Now... Do you need my help to send you back?

column2: that's all right... ! But in consideration of your health
column3: you are allowed to stay in this cold place for no more than 5 minutes! <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>No matter how thorough your visit is
column4: you will leave here without warning after 5 minutes</FONT>! Take your time now...

column1: You have proven yourself to be a brave man! And you have lived up to our expectations! Christmas has become holy and pure because of you! Will you submit to the task and leave?
Please inform me whenever you want to go!!

column2: the seals followed the Naughty
column3: Evil Snowmen to a place called the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Land of Ice and Snow</FONT>! I... I can't hurt my companions
column4: but I hope you can help me to release their souls. I don't think seals born with such kind hearts would allow themselves to do those murderous acts when they were controlled... especially on this holy Christmas... This all depends on you
column5: brave man! Please...

column1: What? You haven't reached the rank of <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>10</FONT>!? Although you are so determined... I am afraid that you are not yet powerful enough to become a love fighter... Ask me again when you improve your power after more practice
column2: and I will bring you into <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>the Love Chamber </FONT>

column1: What's wrong? Are you not the team leader?

column2: and fighting for love...
White Heart Biscuit+1
and fighting for love...

column1: You deserve to become a love fighter... ! You are so charming with your understanding of love... ! The <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Black Heart Biscuit</FONT> and <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>White Heart Biscuit</FONT> are for you... love fighter... !  Are you gonna forfeit the mission and leave now?
Please let me know whenever you want to leave!!   I won't give the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>White Heart Biscuit</FONT> or <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Black Heart Biscuit</FONT> to you yet!  Otherwise
column2: I fear the biscuits will melt with your passion...

column1: Please bring this <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>coat</FONT> made by Chestnut's mother to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Chestnut</FONT>!
You... Can... Not... See... Me... Can't... See... Me... Please... Don't... Don't... Hurt... Hurt... Me... Me...
That's it! It's mom who sent you here...... (Speechless because of fear)... No
column2: no
column3: don't be afraid! Are you a friend of my mother? Nice to meet you... ! My name's Chestnut. I am 13 years old! Why did my mother send you here? Chestnut is mama's good boy! He doesn't run away or make her angry.

column1: I forgot what she told me!
Yahoo! What a nice coat! Thanks a lot...  Ah! That reminds me!! You humans have a holiday called...what... <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Mother's Day?</FONT> to show thanks for your mothers
column2: right?

column1: Can I ask you to give me a hand?  I know some people send a carnation bouquet to their mothers to show their gratitude... I'd like to send a <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>carnation bouquet</FONT> to mine! I think... three can be called a bouquet... em... yes
column2: I think so. Em... OK! I will send my mother <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>a carnation bouquet</FONT> with <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>3 carnations</FONT>! I'm only gonna tell this to you! I found seeds to put into this <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Strange Hill</FONT> beside me... It will grow many things in a short time! If you have <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Culture Soil</FONT>
column3: <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Fertilizer</FONT> and <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Nutritional Agent</FONT> you can get a surprising result!  But... <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>the Flower Seeds</FONT> I collected have been snatched by the naughty <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Flower Spirits</FONT>! I know they live in a place called the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Abandoned Botanic Garden </FONT>... But my mother wouldn't want to see Chestnut fight with others... and Chestnut doesn't even know how... So <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>could Chestnut ask for your help to bring back the Flower Seeds</FONT>... Please!

column1: Play in the mud over there!

I'm counting on you! Do you need some time to get ready?  Chestnut will show you the way to the <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Abandoned Botanic Garden</FONT> when you are ready... Chestnut will wait for you here... I won't leave until you come back Please come back soon!

column2: and I am 13 years old! Don't call me a little boy! Why? Because I'm responsible enough to be an older brother!

column1: Is there anybody more pitiful than you? Don't you know anything about Mother's Day?! Sorry... I didn't mean to hurt you... Sorry again...
Ah... It doesn't matter Thank you all the same... If you get a chance
column2: please say hello to Mom for Chestnut... Chestnut wants to say: He misses his mother...

column1: <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Mother</FONT> <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Help</FONT> <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Help</FONT> <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Help</FONT>... <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Help me</FONT>...
<FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Mother! </FONT><FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Help</FONT> <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Help</FONT> <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Help</FONT>... <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Help me</FONT>...

column2: Captain Stella and vice-captain Bugis sacrificed themselves and saved the fifth squad.......The captain of patrol team wants to encourage the remaining soldiers of the fifth squad. <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Menayore is to find the soldier Kager of fifth squad</FONT> and cheer him up.

column1: Talk to Menayore for more information.
Are you here to help me? Let me see what you can do...  Yes
column2: could you please help me find <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Kager</FONT> and make sure that he is doing ok?

column1: There are only three soldiers left in the fifth squad. They are <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Kager
column2: Geeze
column3: Silence</FONT>. We are worried about their conditions. Please find Kager and ask how they are doing. He is at <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>the southeast corner</FONT> of the city.

column1: Captain... I am sorry...sister Bugis...I am sorry...
Please don't bother me! I'm such a loser. It's like I'm infected with <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>a loser virus</FONT>.  I am a useless person!
Haha... I know what you are here for. I will be ok and will be back when I am ready.
You don't care about me at all. Please leave me alone!
Hahah.... It is all my fault! I don't need anyone to be sympathetic toward me! Get out!
Mission completed. Please report to Menayore.
Mission completed! Here is your <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Intro Mission Cert</FONT>. Please take this certificate to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Captain Dean</FONT>. The more certificates you get
column2: the more rewards you will receive!

column1: Open some slots in your backpack for the certificate. You don't want to meet <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Captain Dean</FONT> empty handed...
You should go back now. I want to be alone.
A lot of Umbra came to Meteor Pit. Some villagers went missing out there. Please find <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Menayore</FONT> to check how many villagers are missing.
Talk to Menayore for more information.

Are you here to help me? Let me see what you can do... Yes. We need to find a lost villager named <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Arsa</FONT>. He went to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Spiritual Land to collect some materials</FONT>. He might be somewhere in <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Spiritual Land</FONT>. Please help us find him!
You can go to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Spiritual Land</FONT> to find <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Arsa</FONT>.
Wah... I told them I will be back after I finish my mission. I guess you wasted your time searching for me. Anyways
column2: please let them know I'm not lost.

column1: Mission completed. Please report to Menayore.

column2: the more rewards you will receive!

You should go back now. I want to be alone.

Are you here to help me? Let me see what you can do... Yes. We lost a villager named <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Dori</FONT>. He went to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Holy Plain to collect some medicine</FONT>. He might be somewhere in <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Holy Plain</FONT>. Please help us find him!
<FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Dori was looking for a Flower of Line Color around Saint Field and Holy Plain</FONT> for his wife. I hope he is safe.
Have you seen a flower named <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Flower of Line Color</FONT>?   I have to find it for my wife's disease. Please tell me if you know...
Did the patrol send you here too? I don't care for my own safety any more. I am worried about my wife's health. Please tell them I won't be back until I find cure for her.
Wow... I thought this is just a legend. Please let me know if you see it. Thanks!

Kigaro has a secret identity. It is said that Ruined Mansion was originally  a headquarter of underground union. But it turned into Umbra's playground in time. The union had sent Iche
column2: Rubion and Linda to investigate the situation
column3: but patrol sent <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Kigaro</FONT> as a backup investigator.

column1: Patrol team must have sent you here. I found something strange here.  Every full moon
column2: the Umbra from Thunder Plain would attack Ruined Mansion. Could you please let them know about this? Also tell them I'm okay. Thank you.

column1: Please tell them that I will be back after I finish the mission. Don't worry.

Captain Stella and vice-captain Bugis sacrificed themselves to save the fifth squad in Plague Dungeon..... Volunteer soldier Yamir went to Plague Dungeon alone to spy on the Umbra. Captain Wight want someone to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>stop Yamir</FONT>.
Talk to Menayore for more information.
Are you here to help me? Let me see what you can do... Yes
column2: <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>volunteer soldier Yamir</FONT> went to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Plague Dungeon</FONT> alone. Captain want someone to bring her back. Can you help out?

column1: Yamir is too young to take the challenge. I hope she can come back safe and sound.

column2: geeze... someone help me... .. sniff... sniff...

I wasn't crying. I am <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Yamir</FONT>. I want to <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>avenge for captain and vice-captain.</FONT> Umbra can't scare me away! Please tell captain that I ... I... <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>won't be back before I  defeat all Umbra!</FONT> I seriously am NOT afraid..........
come on!

column1: What? You just turned away from me? How can you leave a little girl like me in such  wild place. I just can't move my legs... Ok
column2: I was wrong. Please help me get out of  here! Sniff sniff..

column1: I will defeat the monsters in Plague Dungeon. I don't need your help!
Nothing will happen. Those monsters are scared by me
column2: the brave Yamir!

column1: Mission completed. Please report to Menayore.

Yamir should grow up a little. Actually I casted<FONT COLOR=#00ff00> freeze spell</FONT> on her and  put shield around her so she will be safe. Maybe we should keep her that way  for a while to teach her a lesson. Here is your <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>Intro Mission Cert</FONT>!

column1: Merol's conversation. This guy has a good heart although he talks in a not-so-nice way.

column2: it is logical for me to research new formulas.
alright
column3: whatever

column2: I hope everyone should be like you!...     Hey! Hold on! I should tell you what to prepare first!

column1: No time? I will ask for someone else then.
I can't believe it. This formula is not dangerous. Why didn't I pass the last exam?
You are not qualified to help me. You should gain more experience first.
Miro asked me to collect <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>10 Gob's blood</FONT>
column2: <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>5 Mirror Parts</FONT>
column3: and <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>1 Copper Ore</FONT>. They should be around the Trial Cave.

column2: Gold x 150

column1: I will know what to do after talking with Miro.
Don't worry. How do you know if I didn't tell you what to prepare.
You have such a bad attitude
I told you. This is me.
You need to collect <FONT COLOR=#00ff00>5 Mirror Parts</FONT>.
Ah... I don't need Brick Agent anymore. You can go back.
Forget it. I still have some left. You just need to get what I told you.
I need to get his item
column2: which is written in the quest log.

column1: Great job on those gob's blood! I don't need these Mirror Parts and Copper Ore now. Here is the money I owe you. You may buy some medicines. Hahah.... And I should give you some bonus because you were fast!
